ygData.subject: Re: Treehuggers?
ygData.msgSnippet: Since shout is for roleplaying I was thinking of holding it there.  The previous 2 ideas are great but I think it would be almost imposible to keep a running
ygData.messageBody:
Since shout is for roleplaying I was thinking of holding it there. The previous
2 ideas are great but I think it would be almost imposible to keep a running
list while everyone is speaking. Messages scroll by too fast. Instead of holding
a stick maybe have a speaking block and a line behind it. So everyone lines
up and gets to talk for a minute or so. (Gets 3 messages) and gets back in line
if he chooses. Maybe we can try it free style at first and then move to ordered
if needed.
